input.sentences: today is my coworkers birthday | and i got her a special gift .
she enjoyed the gift card that i got for her .
the office pooled together and got her a well decorated cake .
it was the best of both worlds | chocolate and vanilla .
it was so tasty | even my dog wanted a taste .
output.sentences: It was a special day created at my new job where coworkers exchanged gifts.
My gift, which i thoroughly enjoyed was a gift card.
We even pooled together some money around the office to get a specially decorated cake.
The extra money spent was well worth it as the cake vanilla and chocolate cake was worlds above the average.
Even our office pet, Joe the dog, got to taste the tasty cake.
